title: Glass no Usagi (Glass Rabbit)
synopsis: Toshiko Ei and her family are residents of Tokyo. Her father is a respected and skilled glass craftsmen so the family makes a good living. However, the Ei family soon finds itself having to suffer through many tragic hardships as a result of World War II.
staff: [['Shibuichi, Setsuko', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Shimizu, Katsunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Suenaga, Mitsuyo', ['Script']], ['Oshima, Michiru', ['Music']]]
